{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TRENDnet |model=TEW-670AP |revision=V1.x |upc=710931600742 |ean= |asin=B003O8J1BY;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/01/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=XU8TEW670AP |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand=Ralink |cpu2_model=RT2880 |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, dual |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi2_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip2_model=RT2850 |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6693;913, 6693, A943;2 ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6671;159, 6671, A931;2; |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.10.100 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:14:D1 |oui_eth=00:14:D1 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Concurrent Dual Band Wireless N Access Point}}
:[http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=155_TEW-670AP&cat=161 Product page] "7016A0266000 V1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The same text is found on the [[TRENDnet TEW-671BR]]'s board. Addl. info, from the 671BR's entry... *This device uses the RT3052 as the main processor. The RT2880 is operating in '''iNIC''' mode (operating as a NIC remotely via its MII interface). *U-Boot is presumably used for the bootloader, the OS used is probably Linux
